name: marlincdm_json_request_message
description: Marlin Content Decryption Module json request message for EME case

httpRequest.descripion: http request message. this property is required if message_type is httpRequest

method.description: either GET or POST to indicate the HTTP request method

url.description: server url. this property is required for Android case.

headers.description: http header parameters. an array of one or more JSON objects

name.description: string specifying the HTTP header name

value.description: string specifying the HTTP header value

body.description: base64-encoded string containing the HTTP message body

queryRequest.description: queryRequest message. this property is required if message_type is queryRequest

name.description: The name to query a Marlin property

completeNotification.descripion: completeNotification message. this property is required if message_type is completeNotification. If this property exist, httpRequest property doesn't exist hence no http requesting to server shuold not happen

resultCode.descripion: result code whose value specifing action results

reason.descripion: http request message. this property may be present if the resultCode is not 0
